name: CSRD2-L2.WAD
description: A drop in for level two in DOOM ][ : After struggling through the caverns : and making your way thru the hallways : belonging to the lost demons you blast : to the exit and continue deeper into : the home of the Lost Demons. : You enter and find cheerful music playing : in the background, you know this means the demons : won't hear you until you jump in front of them. : Music calms the savage beasts!
